DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , three-period , multi-center clinical trial . Following Screening Qualification Period two-week Washout Period ( subject enter study phosphate binder ) , eligible subject randomize 1:1 ratio receive either KRX-0502 ( ferric citrate ) placebo approximately 12 week . The purpose study determine KRX-0502 ( ferric citrate ) safe effective treatment management serum phosphorus level iron deficiency anemic CKD subject dialysis .
